title: Server Transfer Bug
body:
Hello guys so I transferred from NA to Lan and now i can't Login to my account it tells me my account has been transferred to another region on the Client and on the website it just doesn't let me login at all.( It only lets me change my password ).  I did open a ticket already but it dosent let me open the link for my ticket it only takes me to a login page .Please Riot take a look at my account and fix it please .

"¡Gracias por ponerte en contacto con nuestro equipo de Soporte al Jugador! Hemos recibido tu petición (#20433910), y uno de nuestros especialistas te responderá lo más pronto posible"

replies.body:
Your account didn't actually transfer, it's still on NA.

You have to leave all your ranked teams before you can transfer to a new region.
